snippet: Even the most standard turkey options and cooking choices present an array of possible endpoints — nearly all of which result in a delicious bird. No matter what you choose, it’ll turn out fine. It has every year since 1621, right?
lead_paragraph: Even the most standard turkey options and cooking choices present an array of possible endpoints — nearly all of which result in a delicious bird. No matter what you choose, it’ll turn out fine. It has every year since 1621, right?
